embed: <object width="640" height="390"><param name="movie" value="http://youtube.com/v/MrEoE0Py5ZY?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://youtube.com/v/MrEoE0Py5ZY?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="640" height="390" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
summary:
GNU MediaGoblin is a free software media publishing system written in Python
for images, video, and audio. This talk starts by tricking you into watching
the mediagoblin_campaign_pitch video, and then Chris explains how he used
Python to drive Blender to make the animated effects.
title: MediaGoblin Update
